ygData.subject: Re: mixing bowls
ygData.msgSnippet: 2 backpacks in the top slots (upper left has my food and water). Sketches and Water in the middle two slots. Fill the rest with clay. Make your unfired bowls,
ygData.messageBody:
2 backpacks in the top slots (upper left has my food and water). Sketches and
Water in the middle two slots. Fill the rest with clay. Make your unfired bowls,
get your firing sheets. Then you'll have 4 open spots to put mixing bowls in. If
you buy 18 sketches and water instead of 20, you'll have 6 open slots the second
time on each run-through. I do this in Halas where I don't have to travel far.
Unfortunately, the lines are too long to make this profitable anymore. Well,
compared to anything else anyway =P
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

Brandon Purrington wrote:

> From: "Brandon Purrington" <mbmcenterprises@...>
>
> Ok, I love this list!! I just have one question...
> I have a 120 currently in pottery and have tried to make mixing bowls. I
> made them with no problems, but having 7 backpacks on me for materials, when
> i successfully fired the bowl, it droped to the ground because a container
> can't be stored in another container..... now, how in the world are you
> doing this efficiently? As it is, I have a better/faster time making pie
> tins..... any help would be greatly appreciated!!
